name: Max Width Changer for Ao3
description: Literally just takes the site and gives it maximum width of 1200 pixels, while centering it so it doesn't sit on one side. Improves readability for wide screens. Shouldn't conflict with other skins etc. -- unless they also use a class by the name of "wrapper".
additional_info: The 1200px is a suggestion, feel free to adjust to your taste.
